items.metataghtml: <meta name="description" content="Walker Tape®’s Safe Grip is our liquid adhesive for sensitive skin clients.">
items.storedetaileddescription: Walker Tape®’s Safe Grip is our liquid adhesive for sensitive skin clients. It is a non-toxic, skin safe, extended wear (1-3 weeks) adhesive. Safe Grip provides users with a gentle and secure wear experience. Keep the product away from heat, humidity, and light. Store in a well-ventilated, cool, dark, dry, room-temperature controlled environment (60-80°F). Close bottle lids tightly. With proper storage, our liquid products have a shelf life of up to six months.
items.outofstockbehavior: Allow back orders with no out-of-stock message
items.featureddescription:
Close lid tightly.
Do not apply to broken, cut, or irritated skin.
External use only, do not ingest.
Avoid eye contact.
Keep out of reach of children.
Test on a small area before use.
Store in a well-ventilated, cool, dark, dry, room-temperature controlled environment (60-80°F).
items.displayname: Safe Grip - 16 fl oz, Squeeze Bottle
items.storedisplayname2: Safe Grip - 16 fl oz, Squeeze Bottle
items.storedescription:
Make sure client’s scalp is clean and oil free. 

Poly Systems

Using a sponge brush, apply thin even coats of Safe Grip to unit. 

Mesh Units 

Using a sponge brush, apply thin even coats of Safe Grip to scalp. 

Blow dry until tacky between coats. Next press the hair system onto the skin and firmly hold for 10 seconds. Do not swim, workout, or shampoo for at least 24 hours. We recommend performing a patch test before use.
items.pagetitle: Safe Grip - 16 fl oz, Squeeze Bottle | Walker Tape
